padded.name: Padded Armor
padded.description: Quilted cloth armor, provides minimal protection

leather.name: Leather Armor
leather.description: Boiled and treated leather, flexible and quiet

studded_leather.name: Studded Leather
studded_leather.description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs

ring_mail.name: Ring Mail
ring_mail.description: Leather armor with metal rings sewn onto it

scale_mail.name: Scale Mail
scale_mail.description: Metal scales attached to a leather backing

chain_mail.name: Chain Mail
chain_mail.description: Interlocking metal rings, flexible but heavy

splint_mail.name: Splint Mail
splint_mail.description: Metal strips riveted to leather backing

banded_mail.name: Banded Mail
banded_mail.description: Overlapping metal bands on chain mail backing

plate_mail.name: Plate Mail
plate_mail.description: Full suit of shaped and fitted metal plates

shield_small_wood.name: Small Wooden Shield
shield_small_wood.description: Simple wooden shield, blocks 1 attack per round

shield_small.name: Small Shield
shield_small.description: Metal-rimmed shield, blocks 1 attack per round

shield_medium.name: Medium Shield
shield_medium.description: Standard shield, blocks 2 attacks per round

shield_large.name: Large Shield
shield_large.description: Large shield, blocks 3 attacks per round (not usable by Druids - too heavy/metal)

helmet_great.name: Great Helmet
helmet_great.description: Full metal helmet with face protection

Fighter.description: Can wear any armor and use any shield

Ranger.description: Can wear any armor and use any shield

Paladin.description: Can wear any armor and use any shield

Cleric.description: Can wear any armor and use any shield

Druid.description: Can only wear leather armor and use wooden/light shields (metal armor spoils magical powers)

Magic-User.description: Cannot wear armor or use shields

Illusionist.description: Cannot wear armor or use shields

Thief.description: Can only wear leather armor, cannot use shields

Assassin.description: Can wear any armor and use any shield

Monk.description: Cannot wear armor or use shields (AC improves with level)

Bard.description: Limited to light armor and light shields

magic_armor_notes.weight_negation: Magic armor negates weight for movement purposes - movement rate is not reduced
magic_armor_notes.ac_improvement: Each +1 of magic improves AC by 1 (e.g., Plate Mail +3 = AC 0 instead of AC 3)
magic_armor_notes.stacking: Magic bonuses from armor and shields stack (Plate Mail +2 and Shield +1 = AC 0)
